gw.api.assignment

Class PublicAssignableQueueFinder

  • gw.api.assignment.PublicAssignableQueueFinder

  • public class PublicAssignableQueueFinder
    Utility with a set of finders for assignable queues.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> findAllActivitiesFromQueuesFromGroupsOfCurrentUser()
      Finds all activities from the group of the current user's queues.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> findVisibleQueuesForUser(User user)
      Find all queues visible to the given user. A queue is visible if: It is either in a group that is in one of the user's security zones, or the user has the "view all queues" permission It is either in one of the user's groups or has the "sub group visible" flag set
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> findVisibleQueuesInUserAndAncestorGroups(User user)
      Find all queues visible to the given user within the user's ancestor group tree (user's groups' ancestors). A queue will be returned if: It is either in a group that is in one of the user's security zones, or the user has the "view all queues" permission It is either in one of the user's groups or has the "sub group visible" flag set and is in ancestor group.

      • findVisibleQueuesForUser

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> findVisibleQueuesForUser(User user)
        Find all queues visible to the given user. A queue is visible if:
        • It is either in a group that is in one of the user's security zones, or the user has the "view all queues" permission
        • It is either in one of the user's groups or has the "sub group visible" flag set
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:

      • findVisibleQueuesInUserAndAncestorGroups

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> findVisibleQueuesInUserAndAncestorGroups(User user)
        Find all queues visible to the given user within the user's ancestor group tree (user's groups' ancestors). A queue will be returned if:
        • It is either in a group that is in one of the user's security zones, or the user has the "view all queues" permission
        • It is either in one of the user's groups or has the "sub group visible" flag set and is in ancestor group.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
